title: Tutte polynomial
summary: The Tutte polynomial, also called the dichromate or the Tutteâ€“Whitney polynomial, is a graph polynomial. It is a polynomial in two variables which plays an important role in graph theory. It is defined for every undirected graph G {\displaystyle G} and contains information about how the graph is connected. It is denoted by T G {\displaystyle T_{G}} .
